Sentencas: The thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC) thin films play a vital role in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Efficient statistical approach for thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Nonetheless, the effects of temperature, dopant concentration, and thickness on thermal expansion, and ionic conduction remain ambiguous.
Titulo: Efficient statistical approach for thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: In the present study, we propose an efficient theoretical approach to emphasize the roles of surface layers and surface vicinity (called next -surface layers) on the thermoelectrical properties of GDC thin films.
Titulo: Efficient statistical approach for thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Using statistical moment method, thermal expansion coefficient, and ionic conductivity are calculated as functions of temperature, dopant concentration, and thickness.
Titulo: Efficient statistical approach for thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: The lattice strain and ionic disorder in the surface and next -surface layers cause an increase in thermal expansion coefficient and ionic conductivity of thin films.
Titulo: Efficient statistical approach for thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Compared with bulk GDC, the thermal expansion coefficient is slightly larger while the ionic conductivity is more than one to two orders of magnitude enhancement and exhibits the maximum value at the higher concentration.
Titulo: Efficient statistical approach for thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity depends non -linearly on the dopant concentration and the maximum conductivity is shifted toward a higher value as the temperature increases.
Titulo: Efficient statistical approach for thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: The enhancement in thermal expansion coefficient and ionic conductivity offers new opportunities for SOFC electrolytes whose efficiency can be effectively controlled by tailoring the thickness.
Titulo: Efficient statistical approach for thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: The theoretical calculations are compared to measured results from experiments.
Titulo: Efficient statistical approach for thermo-electrical properties of gadolinia-doped ceria thin films
